mapper.sql: select need_extra_approval, car_apply_id, user_id, car_id, driver_id, telphone, driver_whether, people_number, start_time, end_time, area_select, start_location_id, end_location_id, driver_status, approve_status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, del_flag, progress, apply_status, approval_user_id, fee_type, fee_total, driver_status from umap_car_apply

SELECT a.car_apply_id, a.telphone, a.driver_whether, a.people_number, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.area_select, a.approve_status, a.driver_status, a.remark, a.create_time, a.create_by, u.user_name as applicant, u1.user_name as driver_name, u2.user_name as create_by_name, i.license_plate_number as car_name, s.location_name as start_location, e.location_name as end_location FROM umap_car_apply a LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON a.driver_id = u1.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON a.create_by = u2.user_id LEFT JOIN umap_car_info i on a.car_id = i.car_id LEFT JOIN umap_map_location s on a.start_location_id = s.location_id LEFT JOIN umap_map_location e on a.end_location_id = e.location_id
mapper.select:
SELECT u.car_apply_id, r.approval_user_id, r.create_by, r.status, u.approve_status, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.start_time, u.end_time, s.user_name, u.need_extra_approval FROM wf_event_audit_record r LEFT JOIN umap_car_apply u ON r.apply_id = u.car_apply_id left join sys_user s on u.user_id =s.user_id
apply_type like '%car_approve%' and start_time >= #{startTime} and end_time <= #{endTime} and r.approval_user_id = #{approvalUserId} and r.status = #{approveStatus}
and r.status != '0'
order by r.status asc, create_time desc

SELECT car_id FROM umap_car_apply WHERE (
(#{startTime} >= start_time AND #{startTime} <= end_time)
OR (#{endTime} >= start_time AND #{endTime} <= end_time)
OR (#{startTime} <= start_time AND #{endTime} >= end_time) ) AND car_id is not null AND approve_status IN (0, 1) AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY car_id

select distinct a.driver_id from ( SELECT driver_id FROM umap_car_apply WHERE #{startTime} <= start_time AND #{endTime} >= start_time AND #{endTime} <= end_time AND driver_id is not null AND approve_status IN (0, 1) AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY driver_id UNION SELECT driver_id FROM umap_car_apply WHERE #{startTime} >= start_time AND #{endTime} >= start_time AND #{endTime} <= end_time AND driver_id is not null AND approve_status IN (0, 1) AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY driver_id UNION SELECT driver_id FROM umap_car_apply WHERE #{startTime} >= start_time AND #{startTime} <= end_time AND #{endTime} >= end_time AND driver_id is not null AND approve_status IN (0, 1) AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY driver_id UNION SELECT driver_id FROM umap_car_apply WHERE #{startTime} <= start_time AND #{endTime} >= end_time AND driver_id is not null AND approve_status IN (0, 1) AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY driver_id) as a

SELECT a.need_extra_approval, a.car_apply_id, a.user_id, a.car_id, a.driver_id, a.telphone, a.driver_whether, a.people_number, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.area_select, a.start_location_id, a.end_location_id, a.driver_status, a.approve_status, a.create_time, a.remark, u.user_name, c.license_plate_number, a.progress, a.approval_user_id, d.user_name as driver_name, a.driver_status FROM umap_car_apply a left join sys_user u on a.user_id = u.user_id left join sys_user d on a.driver_id = d.user_id left join umap_car_info c on a.car_id = c.car_id where a.car_apply_id = #{carApplyId}

select d1.date `date`, IFNULL(d2.sumappointment, 0) `value` from ( select date from (select adddate('1970-01-01', t4.i*10000 + t3.i*1000 + t2.i*100 + t1.i*10 + t0.i) date from (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t0, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t1, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t2, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t3, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t4) v where date between #{startDay} and #{endDay} ) d1 left join ( select DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") date , count(1) sumappointment from umap_car_apply where create_time >= '${startDay} 00:00:00' and create_time <= '${endDay} 23:59:59' and approve_status= 1 GROUP BY date ) d2 on d1.date = d2.date order by date asc
